analysis.description:
LocalEthereumEscrows.transferMinusFees (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#375-387) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_value - _totalFees) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#384-387)

LocalEthereumEscrows.transferToken (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#426-432) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_tokenContract.transfer(_transferTo,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#431)

LocalEthereumEscrows.transferTokenFrom (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#433-440) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_tokenContract.transferFrom(_transferTo,_transferFrom,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#438-440)

LocalEthereumEscrows.approveToken (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_tokenContract.approve(_spender,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol)

LocalEthereumEscrows.createEscrow (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#95-122) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _expiry) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#113)
	- require(bool)(! escrows[_tradeHash].exists) (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#111)

LocalEthereumEscrows.doSellerCancel (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#193-216) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _escrow.sellerCanCancelAfter <= 1 || _escrow.sellerCanCancelAfter > block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#205-207)
Token.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#3-4) should be declared external
Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#4-5) should be declared external
Token.approve (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#5-7) should be declared external
LocalEthereumEscrows.batchRelay (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#355-371) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tradeID' of LocalEthereumEscrows.getRelayedSender (/unique_contracts/0x330e24d4aa0a60acac8f9fe6d674d3cf1e8042c6.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
